name: George Haws
tagline: Full Stack Rubyist and Javascript Developer
body:
# Welcome!
View my main Github repositories here: https://github.com/geehaws

Email me at: geehaws@gmail.com, and check me out on [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=78431874)

View my resume [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1O0vInjEy9gNm69ygQBc76Jj5gnWY16BTGBHY1k3R6Hs/pub)

## Here are some of the bigger projects I am working on:

### Microsites

http://www.stylelist.com/read/streetstylelist/#
http://www.bravotv.com/top-chef-home-edition/share


Embedded photo stream microsites for AOL and NBC Universal, respectively. Highly trafficked Backbone apps served by an external API. Produced under short deadlines and strict requirements.


### Nevernote (personal project)

http://never-note.herokuapp.com/

https://github.com/geehaws/Nevernote

This is an Evernote clone I built in Javascript on the Backbone.js framework. It is served by RESTful Rails API and utilizes JQuery's UI plugin to create an interactive user experience. It is a 100% asynchronous single-page app that allows for WYSIWYG text editing, version tracking, and image uploading. Stores uploaded files with AWS S3.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
